section.summary:
Online EIP Modules

Join the Webinar Classroom, Tuesday 9:00 am - 12:15 pm Pacific Time.

There will be no webinar this week.  You are required to work independently on the Northwestern Health Sciences University Online Modules.  These modules will help you form a foundation for the material we will discuss in up-coming classes.  You do not need to complete the quizzes for each module, but please be aware that your final exam in this class is quite similar to the module quizzes.  All modules must be completed before our lecture in week 5.

Due this week:

  • Continue online EIP modules and complete them by May 30th before class (9:00am)
  • Due May 30th before class (9:00am) - Respond to comments on your post in Discussion Forum #1

Preparation for next week:

  • Kligler & Weeks 2014, Langevin et al 2001 and MacPherson et al. 2016 articles
